author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-L Brands Says Co Issued Notice Of Redemption For $500 Mln Aggregate Principal Amount Outstanding Of Its 8.500 Pct Senior Notes Due 2019
text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - L Brands Inc:
* L BRANDS - ‍ON JAN 3, CO ISSUED NOTICE OF REDEMPTION FOR $500 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OUTSTANDING OF ITS 8.500 PCT SENIOR NOTES DUE 2019
* L BRANDS SAYS ‍REDEMPTION DATE FOR 2019 NOTES WILL BE FEBRUARY 2, 2018 - SEC FILING​ Source text: [ bit.ly/2AHTIv8 ] Further company coverage:
